name: ElectroDash!
description:
Fun little school project about waves

I originally intended for this to be about electromagnetic waves but due to time, the theme change couldn't affect the assets. Hence why the games title is what it is.

STORY

On a hunt during easter, instead of searching for eggs, Danni is searching for sound waves. Collect as many as you can!

CONTROLS

Movement - Arrow keys

Jump - Space
